abilities.name: Quell
abilities.description: Grants the wielder bonus attack damage against non-hero units.
notes: Quell is considered as a conditional attack damage bonus
Attack damage bonus values are not displayed in the HUD but are still considered
The attack damage bonus values are considered by critical strike, cleave, splash, lifesteal and with certain abilities
Can be reduced only by flat reductions (e.g. damage block)
Not affected by percentage-based attack damage bonuses or reductions
The attack damage bonus adapts immediately depending on the wielder's range type
Stacks with the Quell of Battle Fury, but not with additional Quelling Blades
Does not work against Buildings, Ward-type units, Illusions, Spirit Bear, Couriers, or Allied units

additionalInfo: Quell is less effective if its wielder is a ranged hero
